spec.expr:
_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fedr.Country) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.name,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.user.name,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by ("fedr.Threat Name",fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by ("fedr.Threat Family",fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fedr.Action,fedr.Severity) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fedr.Classification,fedr.Severity) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by ("fedr.Threat Type",fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.os.name,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (process.name,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (process.type,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (process.executable,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (process.hash.md5,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| unroll process.command_line
| stats by (process.command_line,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| unroll fedr.Target
| stats by (fedr.Target,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fedr.Script,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by ("fedr.Script Path",fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (source.ip,fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| unroll "fedr.MITRE techniques"
| stats by ("fedr.MITRE techniques",fedr.Action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| unroll rule.name
| stats by (rule.name,fedr.Severity) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.name,fedr.Action) count_uniq(process.name) results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.name,fedr.Action) count_uniq("fedr.Event ID") results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.name,fedr.Action) count_uniq("fedr.Threat Name") results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (host.name,fedr.Action) count_uniq("fedr.MITRE techniques") results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (process.name,fedr.Action) count_uniq(host.name) results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{"fedr.Message Type" in (${type:doublequote})}
| fedr.Classification:(${classification:doublequote}) AND fedr.Action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fedr.Severity:(${severity:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fedr.Country) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 5

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
